message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to start the negotiation at $14,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your desire to save, but the value of this product is significant. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
